## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                              | Type                                                   | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` |                                                          | `boolean`                                              | `false`     |
| `href`     | `href`     |                                                          | `string`                                               | `''`        |
| `size`     | `size`     | specify the size of the Link, defaults to m              | `"l" \| "m" \| "s" \| "xl" \| "xs" \| "xxl" \| "xxxl"` | `'m'`       |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | specify the appearance of the Link, defaults to primary. | `"over-background" \| "primary" \| "secondary"`        | `'primary'` |
